name: POST MORTAL PUZZLER BY SPAGHETTISKULL + DIJJIDOG
name_original: POST MORTAL PUZZLER BY SPAGHETTISKULL + DIJJIDOG
description:
MUST READ:

-Game takes a bit to load depending on how good of a pc you have so just continue staring at that blank screen until it pops up!

-there are a few bugs here and there but I think it's ok!

-if you have a slow pc there is a version of the game that you can find in the 'lp' folder which increases performance but decreases the visuals.

DESCRIPTION:

This game was made for wowie jam 3.0 and the main goal is to kill yourself in the game! It's a little bit like that game about holes in the wall but with no holes in the wall and made badly and the main goal is to die! everything but the charicter controller was made in 72 hours.

Cartoon violence and dark themes:

rated 12+

HOW TO INSTALL:

download the files, hit extract, then open the file named 'post mortal puzzler by the spaghetti skull and dijjidog for wowie 3.0.exe'

NOT AVALIBLE FOR MAC

REAL MENU COMING IN UPDATE (HOPEFULLY)

please tell me about any bugs.
